statements: SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT product_name, price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, price, profit_margin FROM pricing_strategies ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, market_demand FROM pricing_strategies WHERE market_demand < 50;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE profit_margin >= 0.25 AND market_demand > 500 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE market_demand BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products, SUM(profit_margin) AS total_profit FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT product_name, price, (price * market_demand) AS total_revenue FROM pricing_strategies WHERE profit_margin >= 0.2 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC, price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Pricing_Strategies
SELECT product_name, price FROM Pricing_Strategies ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT trend_name, trend_type FROM Market_Trends
SELECT * FROM Market_Trends WHERE trend_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT trend_name, trend_value FROM Market_Trends WHERE trend_type = 'Sales'
SELECT * FROM Pricing_Strategies WHERE price > cost ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, price, cost, quantity_sold FROM Pricing_Strategies WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Pricing_Strategies WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND quantity_sold > 50 ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC, price ASC;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM Pricing_Strategies;
SELECT trend_name, trend_value FROM Market_Trends WHERE trend_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_value DESC, trend_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price, production_date FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description, start_date, end_date FROM pricing_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE 'Discount%' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, trend_start_date, trend_end_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY trend_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Green_Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Green_Products WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Market_Trends WHERE trend_score BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.5;
SELECT analysis_name, analysis_result, timestamp FROM SQL_Analysis WHERE analyst_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_market FROM Pricing_Strategies WHERE discount < 10 ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Green_Products ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Green_Products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT trend_id, trend_name, trend_score FROM Market_Trends WHERE trend_score > 3.0 ORDER BY trend_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT analysis_name, analysis_result, timestamp FROM SQL_Analysis WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT strategy_name, target_market, discount FROM Pricing_Strategies WHERE discount < 10.00 AND target_market = 'Online' ORDER BY discount ASC
SELECT * FROM Green_Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Green_Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_details FROM Pricing_Strategies WHERE strategy_id=2;
SELECT * FROM Market_Trends WHERE trend_category='Technology';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Green_Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Green_Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Green_Products WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trend_category, trend_description FROM Market_Trends WHERE trend_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT analyst_name, findings FROM Analysis_Report WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, LEFT(strategy_details, 100) AS strategy_summary FROM Pricing_Strategies WHERE LENGTH(strategy_details) > 100;
